meanings.sent1: The umbras of the trees danced on the ground.
meanings.sent2: She sought refuge from the sun under the umbras of the building.
meanings.sent3: The umbras seemed to play hide and seek with the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: As the day faded, the umbras grew longer and more mysterious.
meanings.sent5: The umbras cast a cloak of darkness over the path ahead.

meanings.sent1: The umbras in the room made it difficult to see clearly.
meanings.sent2: The umbras under the bed seemed to hide secrets.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly called the shady spots in the garden umbras hideouts.
meanings.sent4: The umbras of the forest enveloped everything in a deep silence.
meanings.sent5: The umbras of the alley felt eerie and unsettling.

meanings.sent1: The umbras in the old house gave it a haunted feel.
meanings.sent2: She thought she saw strange umbras moving in the darkness.
meanings.sent3: The umbras at the edge of the graveyard seemed to whisper secrets.
meanings.sent4: In the dim light, the umbras took on a spectral quality.
meanings.sent5: The umbras of the misty night seemed to beckon to her.
